libraries.name: Tinygrad
libraries.description: For something in between a pytorch and a karpathy/micrograd

libraries.name: Pytorch
libraries.description: PyTorch is a Python package that provides two high-level features: Tensor computation (like NumPy) with strong GPU acceleration, Deep neural networks built on a tape-based autograd system

libraries.name: Micrograd
libraries.description: A tiny Autograd engine (with a bite! :)). Implements backpropagation (reverse-mode autodiff) over a dynamically built DAG and a small neural networks library on top of it with a PyTorch-like API.
